item.title: Manhole cover, 10th May
item.description:
Insecure knocking mam hole cover in Hatherley Lane at the front of the Nuffield Hospital. It is a constant knocking every time a car drives past. Previously reported.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 10th May
item.description:
Verges are being destroyed. Can a tree be planted to stop this.

item.title: Pothole has returned on Green Lane, 10th May
item.description:
Opposite driveway of “Woodhay”. This was reported and fixed (FixMyStreet ref: 5831543) however, the filled in pothole has already crumbled away to expose the original problem again
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Grass on central reservation both sides of Odessa Farm, 10th May
item.description:
The grass needs cutting by Odessa Farm as it is blocking the view of the traffic coming from Tewkesbury towards Gloucester when we are waiting to cross from the middle into farm yard. By crawling out into carriageway to get vision, it is becoming a very dangerous situation as cars fly by in excess of the speed limit. Been very long for three weeks and getting longer each.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
